reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The art of letter writing
reviews.reviewText: Writing letters has become rare with the much faster, yet less personal, use of email or texting. But, receiving a handwritten letter still creates a certain close relationship between the writer and recipient, in my opinion. Stationery is important to me and finding just the right kind to express myself is quite a job. When I saw this stationery, I knew it was for me. And, upon receiving it, I was not disappointed. It is well made, very pretty, easy to write on and the matching envelopes are a dream. You will love this product! It's perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful artwork drew me
reviews.reviewText: This item was exactly for what I was searching, as a gift for a friend. She enjoys writing letters and I try to keep her supplied with plenty of paper---so she will continue to write me. We are childhood friend since we were 3 years old, some 80-plus years ago. She and I both dabble with art, so she will appreciate the beautiful oriental themed artwork; it is beautiful. it makes me happy just looking at it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty designs
reviews.reviewText: I love this stationary. The designs are beautiful with the matching envelopes. The envelopes do not seal I have to put glue on them but still nice. I was asked about the "sheerness" I have no idea what they mean by that. I mean it's nice paper, but I have no idea about the sheerness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Elegant Stationery
reviews.reviewText: I bought this stationery to use as invitations for my parents' celebration of life. It's very high quality paper, the different designs are lovely and the envelopes are beautiful. And you can't beat the price! My only complaint is that the adhesive is difficult to peel off, and clumps. Otherwise, I was very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty stationery, thickness of paper good, price great too.
reviews.reviewText: Received this stationery set today and am happy. There are 4 sheets of 10 designs, though in one design I actually received 6 sheets. 😍 There are two envelopes included per design. These open on a short end which I like for its uniqueness. Also included is a small sheet of 3M stickers to seal the envelopes closed. The thickness is good. I've only used one type of pen with it at the moment, iBayam fineliner pen which has water-based ink. I didn't see any bleedthrough with this pen. I'm going to enjoy writing letters to others in this pretty stationery. Would recommend you purchasing it also if you like to write letters. I feel like it was a good value for $9.99. I would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and totally worth the price!
reviews.reviewText: I've recently become a pen pal with one of my good friends who lives in another state, and I needed stationary. These could be so much more expensive! They're so cute, they feel very special, and I will buy them again when I run out. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is really gorgeous stationary. There pages have art on one side and are blank on the back. There is a variety of beautiful art and you can mix and match the paper to the envelopes if you'd like.The envelopes are very sturdy and not sheer. They do not have wet-activated adhesive on them. The set comes with adhesive strips to be applied to the envelope when you want to seal them.These are a wonderful way to keep up with friends and family in a more personal way than text or e-mail! And ordering stamps from the USPS website is easy, too, so I don't even have to go to the post office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I still like to write real letters!
reviews.reviewText: This is some of the nicest letter-writing paper with matching envelopes. The Asian watercolor designs are lovely. I'll enjoy sharing with friends!
